document_data.name: Sinylla Zoranyian
document_data.mainbody: '''Sinylla Zoranyian''' was a wizard in service to the [[House of the Moon]] during the {{YearlinkName|1373}}.{{cite book/The Rite}}
document_data.Description: Sinylla had a family resemblance to the sisters Jannatha and Baerimel.
document_data.Abilities: Sinylla could cast ''[[blade barrier]]'', and she was a mage in service to the Temple of [[Selûne]], suggesting she possessed both arcane and divine magical abilities.
document_data.Relationships: She was the cousin of [[Jannatha Goldenshield]] and [[Baerimel Dunnath]].
document_data.History: Sinylla Zoranyian helped [[Taegan Nightwind]] by casting lie-detection [[spell]]s on the other mages aiding the effort to decrypt [[Sammaster]]'s notes on the [[Rage of Dragons]] in {{yearlink|1373}}. Sadly, she was slain by the [[chasme]] summoned by the [[sunwyrm]] impersonating [[Phourkyn One-Eye]].
